WRITING.TITLE: Steve Yzerman does another heart warming class act!
WRITING.TEXT:
https://www.facebook.com/photo.php?fbid=718696718149668 set=a.234782173207794.63754.234591506560194 type=1 relevant_count=1
This was a post by a very selfless man who succeeded in contacting Mr. Yzerman for a man dying of cancer. Mr. Yzerman personally made the call to the man and his wife. Touching bit and a class act. Great for the NHL and the world itself!
Not with that attitude. You might as well say that about the way government is run and just how humans work. No hope for humanity when people think like that.
I'm not in a huff... it's just fun to speak out sometimes.
Just a page for now. It's rumored still... can't really petition something that hasn't been proven to be true or credible. Either way, you never know what a page like that could do.
I do agree with a lot of this. But remember they have a lot of space to add more pavilions and possibly some room to add onto the Norway Pavilion.
Also the people working at the pavilion did not deny any changes were going to be made soon. They just weren't sure of a time table on it.

Apparently it's being rumored all around that epcot will replace most of the ride Maelstrom at the Norway pavilion with the theme from the film Frozen. Frozen being a cute and great film deserves a spot at Disney, but to take away the childhood of so many who love Maelstrom? It seems like a bad move since it's one of the most popular rides at epcot over the past years as is!

WRITING.TITLE: Petition for Epcot to not change Maelstrom (Norway's Ride)
